translation.en: [in alien language] Attack!
Ah oui, I would like to purchase cryptocurrency
-that was started by a famous DJ. -[humans screaming]
Quoi?
[in French] I wasted my life.
[in English] Europe has fallen. Washington, D.C. is all that's left.
translation.ko: 유럽이 무너졌어 남은 건 워싱턴 DC뿐이야

translation.en: It's been… a pleasure serving with all of you.
Except Randall.
My dad's your boss.
-Not no more, champ. -[woman shrieks]
Who's them?
-[heroic music playing] -[man grunts]
-Lucy, look out! -[Lucy yelps]
You know, three days ago,
if somebody told me aliens were gonna blow up the planet,
translation.ko: 누군가가 내게 외계인이 지구를 폭파할 테지만

translation.en: but I'd get to meet you…
Oh, okay. Now?
Uh, uh, kind of a weird time, but--
Go save the planet, Matty!
I got this.
I may not be smart.
The only real job I ever had
was letting scientists spray perfume in my eyes.
translation.ko: 과학자들이 내 눈에 향수를 뿌리게 하는 거였죠

translation.en: So, yeah, I may not be good at lists,
translation.ko: 맞아요, 난 목록 작성에 서투를지도 모르고

translation.en: or, like, planning how I'm gonna get home from places--
translation.ko: 집으로 돌아갈 방법을 계획하는 것도 잘 못하겠지만…

translation.en: Okay, cool! Earth is counting on you.
translation.ko: 그래요, 괜찮아요! 지구가 당신을 믿고 있어요

translation.en: But if there's one thing I can do,
it's bring the high heat.
[in alien language] I wasted my life!
[in English] Yes!
-Matty! -[Matty grunts]
Hang on!
Well, butter my biscuits.
That boy did it. He destroyed the alien hive mind.
translation.ko: 저 청년이 해냈어 외계인의 벌집형 사고 중추를 파괴했다고

translation.en: Now that's what I call a home run.
translation.ko: 난 이럴 때 홈런을 날렸다고 하죠

translation.en: [Lucy] Oh, now what do we do?
Now we rebuild,
or whatever.
Okay, so now I'm just fully naked.
And that's the guy who defeated me? Cool.
translation.ko: 저 남자가 날 물리쳤나? 기가 막히는군

translation.en: I totally blew up that ship.
[imitating Borat] Very nice! My wife!
I don't think I caught your name earlier, young man.
translation.ko: 아까는 젊은이 이름을 못 들은 것 같군요

translation.en: Mulligan. Matty Mulligan.
Senator Cartwright LaMarr.
And it is an honor.
Thanks to you, a small, precious piece of humanity survived.
translation.ko: 당신 덕분에 적은 수나마 소중한 인류가 살아남았어요

translation.en: But these people are gonna need someone to lead them.
A new hero for a new world.
President Mulligan?
-[all cheering] -I like the sound of that, Senator.
And of course, you'll need someone experienced to be your number two.
translation.ko: 물론 경험 많은 사람을 대변인으로 두셔야 할 겁니다

translation.en: [chuckles] Number two.
But yeah, sure. Welcome aboard, chief.
And I know exactly who I want to be my First Lady.
translation.ko: 누가 영부인이 되면 좋을지는 정확히 알아요

translation.en: [Lucy] The grenade pin!
It's like a fairy tale
'cause we just met, and before that, I was unconscious for a while.
translation.ko: 우린 만난 지 얼마 안 됐고 그 전에 난 한동안 의식이 없었으니까요

translation.en: [all cheering] Matty and Lucy! Matty and Lucy!
Don't worry, me and Lucy are gonna fix everything.
translation.ko: 걱정 마요 나랑 루시가 다 해결할게요

translation.en: The end.
[all continue cheering] Matty and Lucy! Matty and Lucy!
I should've stayed awake in school more.
Matty-- Uh, Mr. President.
Is inflammable the same as flammable or the opposite?
Okay, it's the same.
English is funny, right?
[Lucy] Oh, so sad.
[Matty] Oh, I know.
All that air and space just… [scoffs] …gone.
God, this has gotta be the worst time ever to be president.
translation.ko: 맙소사, 대통령이 되기에는 최악의 시기일 거예요

translation.en: We don't even have electricity.
It's warm! Why?
For, like, the hospitals or… or whatever.
Well, at least we still have each other
and that silly Washington Wizards mascot to make us laugh.
translation.ko: 워싱턴 위저즈팀 마스코트도 바보처럼 우리를 웃겨주고요

translation.en: [mascot, muffled] Oh God! The costume is fused to my skin!
I love that guy.
Well said, madam.
We are indeed fortunate to have such an eloquent and exotic First Lady.
translation.ko: 영부인께선 화술이 뛰어나시고 이국적이어서 우린 정말로 운이 좋네요

translation.en: Well, I'm not First Lady yet, but I'm looking forward to it.
As Miss Nevada, I started a program
translation.ko: 미스 네바다로서 제가 시작한 프로그램이 있어요

translation.en: that matched old magic-show tigers with prisoners.
translation.ko: 옛날 마술 쇼 호랑이들을 죄수들과 짝짓는 거죠

translation.en: Just think what I could do as First Lady.
translation.ko: 제가 영부인으로서 참 많은 일을 할 수 있겠죠?

translation.en: Oh my God, it's Matty and Lucy!
Well, it is indeed.
Matty and Lucy! [all chanting] Matty and Lucy! Matty and Lucy! Matty and Lucy!
-[Matty] Ah, you know it! Stay in school. -[Lucy] Ah, mwah!
[all continue] Matty and Lucy!
Ugh, phones.
-Remember not answering phones? -Aw! I miss that.
translation.ko: 전화 안 받던 거 기억나요? 그립네요

translation.en: So, where you from?
Oh, right. Reno. You?
Boston. Go all the sports.
So, uh, first time in D.C.?
First time anywhere.
What else? What kind of Catholic are you?
translation.ko: 또 뭐가 있지? 어떤 종류의 가톨릭 신자예요?

translation.en: Look, I really do wanna get to know you,
translation.ko: 나도 당신을 더 잘 알고 싶지만

translation.en: but I think there's more important stuff for us to do first.
translation.ko: 우선 처리해야 할 중요한 일이 있다고 봐요

translation.en: Oh yeah, totally. Say no more.
Man.
Ah, jeez.
Come on, Matty, I believe in you.
translation.ko: 기운 내요, 매티! 난 당신을 믿어요

translation.en: You… you do?
You blew up an entire alien army.
translation.ko: 당신이 외계인 군대를 싹 다 날렸잖아요

translation.en: You can totally figure out how to "restart Fast & Furious franchise."
translation.ko: 이런 거 알아내는 건 일도 아니에요 ''분노의 질주' 시리즈 재개' 방법 같은 거요

translation.en: Or one of the other ones.
It's not like you have to do everything alone.
translation.ko: 당신 혼자 모든 걸 해결해야 하는 건 아니잖아요

translation.en: You've got me. And LaMarr.
Yeah, where'd that dude go?
All in favor? All opposed?
Zero-zero again.
That means the vice president breaks the tie,
and I vote "aye."
Money is now considered a person under the law.
Moving on.
I'm just saying, I bet there's lots of people that can help out.
translation.ko: 내 얘기는 도와줄 사람이 많다는 거예요

translation.en: Mr. LaMarr is already doing politics.
translation.ko: 라마 씨가 벌써 정치를 하고 있으니까

translation.en: Why don't we get, like, experts to do the other stuff?
translation.ko: 다른 건 전문가한테 맡기는 게 어때요?

translation.en: Lucy, dude, that's a great idea!
Yes. That way, I can focus on the stuff I'm good at,
translation.ko: 그래요, 그러면 나는 내가 잘하는 일에 집중할 수 있죠

translation.en: like giving everyone cool nicknames,
L-Dog,
while the experts take care of, you know, water and food and all that stuff.
translation.ko: 물이랑 음식 같은 건 전부 전문가가 처리하면 되겠어요

translation.en: And hopefully figure out why the birds are acting so horny.
translation.ko: 새들이 왜 저렇게 발정 났는지도 알아내면 좋겠네요

translation.en: Well, what a wonderful idea it was to assemble this here cabinet, Miss Suwan.
translation.ko: 내각을 모을 생각을 하다니 참 대단하십니다, 수완 씨

translation.en: I do so enjoy when beauty queens dictate executive branch policy.
translation.ko: 미인 대회 출신이 행정부 정책을 좌우하니까 너무 좋네요

translation.en: And you are very welcome.
Okay, so these are, like, the smartest people on Earth.
translation.ko: 자, 지구에서 가장 똑똑한 분들을 이 자리에 모셨어요

translation.en: Yes. Well, during the attack,
most of our nation's scientists and intellectuals
fled the planet on Jeff Bezos' space ark.
translation.ko: 제프 베이조스의 우주 방주를 타고 지구를 탈출했어요

translation.en: [Bezos] Everyone laughed at Bezos, but who's laughing now?
translation.ko: 다들 베이조스를 비웃었지만 이제 웃는 건 누구지?

translation.en: Bezos is! [chuckles]
Bezos wins--
But that's why you've got me to handle all the boring old legislating.
translation.ko: 그래서 내가 있는 겁니다 지루한 입법 일은 내가 처리할게요

translation.en: I've been Chair of the Senate Subcommittee on Loopholes and Minutiae
translation.ko: 나는 꼬꼬마 시절부터 허점과 세목에 관한

translation.en: since I was knee-high to a crumbleberry.
No, totally. You're my main guy.
But, I mean, we could use some help.
Starting with Dr. Farrah Braun.
She's a female scientist.
Just scientist is fine. I was at DARPA.
translation.ko: 그냥 과학자도 괜찮아요 전 국방고등연구계획국 소속이었고

translation.en: Right now, my focus is on getting the tap water to stop doing this.
translation.ko: 지금 집중하는 연구는 수돗물이 이러지 않게 하는 거예요

translation.en: -Oh God. -[LaMarr groans]
But I kind of have my hands full with the boys.
translation.ko: 근데 아들들 때문에 도무지 짬이 나질 않네요

translation.en: -Mom, Yu-Gi-Oh! won't play! -I wanna watch Yu-Gi-Oh!
We've been over this, the Internet doesn't exist anymore.
There's no screens. [chuckles]
My nanny melted, and now there's no screens!
translation.ko: 보모가 녹아버려서 스크린이 돼줄 사람도 없어요!

translation.en: If there's no electricity, is there no electronica?
Isn't that what the "elec" stands for?
What will the clubs in Ibiza play?
We Found Jeremy here at the British Embassy.
Listen to that accent. Guy's a genius.
translation.ko: 억양 좀 들어봐요 저 사람 천재예요

translation.en: Are we to take Molly and listen to silence?
Maybe Professor Prioleau can answer that. He does history.
translation.ko: 프리올로 교수님이 답할 수 있을지도요 역사 전공이세요

translation.en: Oh, but that wasn't a history question. And it was rhetorical.
translation.ko: 역사에 관한 질문이 아니었는데요 수사적 의문문이었죠

translation.en: Well, we're going around the table in order, so--
Yep, okay. Hi. I'm Simon Prioleau.
I'm a Georgetown post-doc with a focus on 19th-century fonts--
Okay, cool. Now all of you are gonna love this next guy.
translation.ko: 멋지네요, 다음 분을 다들 좋아하실 거예요

translation.en: General Scarpaccio, sir.
Yeah, um, so as an important army man, do I get to, like, shoot guns and stuff?
translation.ko: 네, 중요한 군인으로서 총 같은 걸 쏠 수 있게 되나요?

translation.en: Of course, sir. Thank you for your service.
I'm sorry, how old is he?
Whoa, dude. One, racist.
Two, support the troops.
[whispers] Sorry.
We also found a dentist and a carpenter.
No, I sang backup vocals for The Carpenters.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 난 목수가 아니라 카펜터스의 백업 보컬이었어요

translation.en: And a guy who owns a shoe store that didn't get blown up.
translation.ko: 폭파되지 않은 신발 가게의 주인도 있어요

translation.en: Lots of debris out there! [chuckles] Folks are gonna need shoes more than ever!
translation.ko: 잔해가 많아서 그 어느 때보다 신발이 필요할 겁니다!

translation.en: And as future First Lady and your Miss America,
my causes are animals, childhood obesity, and elder literacy.
translation.ko: 제 대의는 동물, 소아 비만 노인 문맹 퇴치에 있어요

translation.en: Lucy Suwan, Washoe County, 5'6".
translation.ko: 루시 수완이에요 워쇼 카운티 출신, 키 168cm

translation.en: Wait, but if there's no food, then there's no obesity, right?
You solved it!
[gasps] Yeah. And I haven't seen many old people since the attack.
translation.ko: 네, 그리고 공격 이후로 노인도 많이 못 봤어요

translation.en: We think the aliens targeted them first
translation.ko: 외계인들이 가장 먼저 노인을 노렸다고 생각해요

translation.en: because they assumed that we revered our elders.
But I am worried about the animals.
I did a fact-finding tour of the National Zoo this morning,
translation.ko: 오늘 아침에 실태 파악차 국립 동물원에 갔는데요

translation.en: and the facts I found were not good facts.
translation.ko: 제가 발견한 실태가 좋은 실태가 아니에요

translation.en: We'd already be out of food if the elephant hadn't 'sploded.
translation.ko: 코끼리가 폭파되지 않았다면 이미 먹이가 떨어졌을 거예요

translation.en: But the biggest issue's power.
The backup generator barely produces enough juice
for the freezer and my Foreman Grill.
Are you sure I can't get you any elephant?
No, thanks.
[muttering] Elephant was my friend.
[screeching] I DON'T SPEAK GORILLA!!!
[in English] So the zoo has a generator?
Those poor animals might be the last of their kind left on Earth.
translation.ko: 그 불쌍한 동물들이 지구에 남은 마지막 종일지도 몰라요

translation.en: We can't let them die out.
Speaking of losing things forever, eh,
the Smithsonian is kinda still on fire.
Imagine if we lost Woodrow Wilson's Klan hood.
translation.ko: 우드로 윌슨의 KKK단 후드를 잃는다고 생각해 보세요

translation.en: Why was that my example?
Okay, sure, but the bottled water is running out fast.
translation.ko: 그래요, 다 좋은데요 생수 소진 속도가 무척 빨라요

translation.en: ♪ And the people need music ♪
-♪ Whoo! ♪ -So where do we start, sir?
Um, why is everybody looking at me?
I… I don't know. You're the experts.
Yes, but you're the president because you're good at throwing.
translation.ko: 네, 하지만 던지기를 잘해서 대통령이 되셨잖아요

translation.en: LaMarr, what are the things that you're always having me sign?
translation.ko: 라마, 맨날 나한테 서명하라고 시키는 게 뭐였죠?

translation.en: Ah! Executive order. You guys do it.
The president's right.
All this silly-billyness is beneath him.
translation.ko: 이런 멍청한 얘기를 대통령님께 하다니 가당찮아요

translation.en: Sir, your job isn't to sit in boring meetings and make boring decisions.
translation.ko: 지루한 회의 자리에서 지루한 결정을 내리실 게 아니라

translation.en: You and Lucy, y'all's job is to give people hope.
translation.ko: 대통령님과 루시는 사람들에게 희망을 줘야 해요

translation.en: Those folks need something to rally behind.
They need their heroes to distract them from, uh--
Oh my word.
Have we even had a victory parade for y'all yet?
translation.ko: 우리 아직 승전 행진도 안 했잖아요?

translation.en: No, we haven't!
What the hell?
Do I get to wave?
-[triumphant music playing] -[crowd clamoring, cheering]
-Hi there. How's it going? -Thank you.
-You're welcome, for everything. -Thank you.
I actually like this.
Pulling a vehicle is an honor in my culture.
translation.ko: 우리 문화에서 차를 끄는 건 명예로운 일이야

translation.en: No one believes you, pal.
I was a general. They named a kind of hat after me.
translation.ko: 난 장군이었어! 내 이름을 딴 모자도 있다고

translation.en: Well, not bad, huh, Luce?
Everyone seems happy.
It's like a Reno car dealership opening, and we're Frank Sinatra Jr.
translation.ko: 꼭 무료 시음회 같아요 우린 술꾼이고요

translation.en: To us.
How is this cold?
Where did you get a generator?
Oh, um, the generator store. Yeah, nah, it's still open.
[zookeeper] I'm sorry, Kojo.
Some idiot stole the generator, and all the food spoiled.
translation.ko: 어떤 멍청이가 발전기를 훔쳐 가서 먹이가 다 상해버렸어

translation.en: You and the others will need to fend for yourselves from now on.
translation.ko: 이제부터 너랑 다른 동물들은 알아서 살아남아야 해

translation.en: [muttering] Geri friend. Geri spared in new world Kojo build.
translation.ko: '제리는 친구다' '제리는 코조가 짓는 새 세상에서 살려준다'

translation.en: And… and who's to say what cold even means?
translation.ko: 게다가 차갑다는 게 무슨 뜻인지 누가 정하는데요?

translation.en: Right? I mean, like, what's cold to me
might feel burning hot to, like, an ice person.
translation.ko: 아이스맨은 타는 듯 뜨겁게 느낄 수도 있잖아요

translation.en: -[woman screams] -[Matty] Oh my God!
[Lucy gasps] Matty!
Unrelated!
This is all his fault.
Dude, shut up!
-[booing] -[man] How could you?
-[woman] You're the animal! -[man] You're the worst!
-[booing continues] -[scoffs] What's their problem?
So a bunch of zoo animals escaped.
It was only 'cause I wanted to give everyone free beer.
Uh, yes, splendid.
But your loving public can be fickle, so we need to pivot,
translation.ko: 사랑하는 국민들은 변덕스러울 수 있으니 구심점이 필요해요

translation.en: like Stonewall Jackson at Chancellorsville,
or Dr. Martin Luther King also.
translation.ko: 마틴 루서 킹 박사 같은 분요

translation.en: Is this really going to distract us?
I mean, we're running out of medicine
and dinosaur chicken nuggets.
And no, my boys won't eat regular chicken nuggets.
translation.ko: 우리 애들은 평범한 치킨너깃은 안 먹는다고요

translation.en: Have you tried telling them that they're actually dinosaur eggs?
translation.ko: 애들한테 그게 사실은 공룡알이라고 얘기해 봤습니까?

translation.en: Of course I have, Mr. Vice President. I have two PhDs.
translation.ko: 당연하죠, 부통령님 전 박사 학위가 두 개예요

translation.en: Oh, this will all just blow over.
Remember when Prince Charles dressed that servant girl up like the queen
translation.ko: 찰스 왕세자가 가정부를 여왕처럼 입힌 다음에

translation.en: and tried to drown her in the bath?
That was only in the news for like a day.
translation.ko: 그 얘기는 뉴스에 딱 하루 나왔어요

translation.en: Oh my God, princes aren't real, man. This is real life.
translation.ko: 맙소사, 왕자는 동화 속에나 있죠 이건 현실 세계예요

translation.en: And I'm afraid the news cycle isn't as fast as it used to be.
translation.ko: 뉴스 주기가 예전만큼 빠를 것 같지 않네요

translation.en: Hey, everybody!
The president took the generator, and now all the zoo animals got away.
translation.ko: 대통령이 발전기를 훔쳐 가서 동물원 동물이 다 탈출했어요!

translation.en: Did you see? There's animals everywhere 'cause of the president!
translation.ko: 봤어요? 사방에 동물이 널린 건 대통령 때문이에요!

translation.en: Well, I agree with the protesters.
So boo! Boo to you!
You knew animals was one of my causes.
translation.ko: 동물이 내 대의 중 하나인 거 알았으면서!

translation.en: Okay, executive order! Everyone's gotta be nice to me again.
translation.ko: 자, 행정 명령이에요! 다들 나한테 다시 잘해줘야 해요

translation.en: Listen, we need some good news.
Something to distract our slack-jawed constituents.
translation.ko: 우리 아둔한 유권자들의 주의를 딴 데로 돌릴 만한 거로요

translation.en: I'm having a sale on Reeboks.
I might be able to reverse-engineer some of my military tech
to purify the water,
but I don't have childcare in the afternoon.
translation.ko: 근데 오후에 애들을 봐줄 사람이 없어요

translation.en: Uh-huh. And who's taking care of your children now?
Uh, TOD-209 has them.
TOD is a, uh, cyborg super soldier my lab was working on.
translation.ko: 토드는 우리 연구실에서 개발 중인 사이보그 슈퍼 군인이에요

translation.en: He helped fight the aliens.
No! No, bad TOD! Fight the aliens!
translation.ko: 안 돼! 그러면 나빠, 토드! 외계인과 싸워야지!

translation.en: I told them he wasn't ready.
translation.ko: 난 분명 아직 준비 안 됐다고 했어요

translation.en: I'm sorry, that's who's watching your kids?
You really need to choose between your career and family, Doctor.
translation.ko: 직업과 가족 중에서 하나를 선택해야죠, 박사님

translation.en: Still?
Uh, um, well, maybe saving the artifacts in the old Smithsonian--
"President bad."
Check the other side, General.
Does it say "mama jama"?
It's just one side.
We gotta nip this unrest in its bud, sir, which means doing something big.
translation.ko: 이런 불만은 싹부터 잘라야 합니다 큰일을 벌여야 한다는 뜻이죠

translation.en: You and Miss Suwan are getting married tomorrow.
translation.ko: 대통령님과 수완 씨가 내일 결혼하는 거예요

translation.en: Tomorrow?
A big ol' royal wedding will change the conversation,
translation.ko: 성대한 결혼식을 열면 화제가 바뀔 거고

translation.en: give the people something to get excited about.
Hey, for our first dance, you can pick anything from Jock Jams.
translation.ko: 첫 번째 춤에 쓸 음악은 90년대 히트곡 모음집에서 골라요

translation.en: -I… I… I don't wanna marry you. -Huh?
I thought I could do this, but those animals don't have homes now
translation.ko: 할 수 있을 줄 알았는데 동물들에겐 이제 집이 없잖아요

translation.en: because of you!
Who cares?
People deserve a generator, not animals.
It goes God, Jesus, people, animals,
translation.ko: 다 순서가 있어요 하느님, 예수님, 사람, 동물

translation.en: plants, fish, bugs, dirt--
We can circle back to the nuptials.
Uh, what else distracts ordinary folks?
translation.ko: 평범한 사람을 홀릴 만한 게 또 뭐가 있을까요?

translation.en: Uh, does anyone have a trampoline?
-Knock, knock. -Simon.
Um, I would've called first, but, uh, there are no phones.
translation.ko: 전화부터 하고 왔어야 했는데 전화가 없어서요

translation.en: -In my head, I thought that was a joke. -Really? How so?
translation.ko: - 머릿속에선 재밌을 것 같았어요 - 정말요? 어떻게요?

translation.en: Anyhoozzle, I just thought, 'Hey, you know, Dr. Braun's a scientist."
translation.ko: 아무튼, 그 생각이 났거든요 '브론 박사님은 과학자니까'

translation.en: "Maybe she has some science stuff that could put out all those museum fires."
translation.ko: '박물관 화재를 진압할 과학 기술을 알지도 몰라'

translation.en: Well, last year, I was working on a cloud-seeding program for DoD.
translation.ko: 작년 국방부 프로그램 중에 구름 씨뿌리기가 있었어요

translation.en: The idea was if we could make it rain,
translation.ko: 이런 아이디어죠 비를 내리게 할 수 있다면

translation.en: Kim-Jong Un would have to cancel all his picnics.
translation.ko: 김정은이 소풍 계획을 다 취소해야 할 거라고요

translation.en: But now I can't access the DARPA Intranet,
translation.ko: 하지만 국방고등연구계획국 인트라넷에 접속이 안 돼서

translation.en: so I have to go through the paper files, which are a mess.
This isn't even in the right box.
translation.ko: 심지어 이건 이 박스 서류도 아니에요

translation.en: Ugh, boxes, am I right? [groans]
What's that? Sorry, I'm a little fried.
translation.ko: 뭔 소리죠? 미안해요 과부하가 좀 걸려서요

translation.en: Work, and since the invasion, I'm all my kids have.
translation.ko: 일에다가 침략 이후로 아이들에겐 저밖에 없거든요

translation.en: [boy whimpers] Giant bugs.
No, don't bomb GameStop!
-[Simon] Ugh. -It's overwhelming.
We may be the two smartest people left on Earth, Simon,
translation.ko: 우리 둘이 지구에 남은 가장 똑똑한 사람일지도 몰라요

translation.en: but are we supposed to save civilization all by ourselves?
translation.ko: 하지만 우리 둘이서만 문명을 구해야 하나요?

translation.en: [TOD-209] TOD get it. Is stressful time.
-Sounds like we all need unwind. -[Simon gasps]
Well…
-Hmm? -[Simon] Mmm!
[scoffs] First you blow up my planet, now you block my bowling alley?
translation.ko: 처음엔 내 행성을 폭파하더니 이젠 볼링 레인을 막냐?

translation.en: If you let me go, you can bowl all you want.
translation.ko: 날 풀어주면 마음껏 볼링 칠 수 있어

translation.en: And it's not even candlepin.
Well, no wonder everybody hates Nixon.
translation.ko: 다들 닉슨을 싫어하는 것도 이해가 간다니까

translation.en: Ugh! What else can go wrong today?
Axatrax, two days ago, I was a hero,
president, engaged to a pre-attack 11,
translation.ko: 공격 전 기준으로 초절정 미녀와 약혼한 대통령이었지

translation.en: and now everyone's pissed at me.
translation.ko: 근데 이젠 모두가 내게 화를 내

translation.en: Look…
[sighs] …I get it.
I was in command of an unstoppable army,
I had the kitchen of my dreams, and now--
You're a loser. Everyone hates you.
I hear you, bro.
Oh, wonderful, we're bonding.
Do you have sarcasm here?
I don't know what your life was like before you totally beefed your invasion,
translation.ko: 침략 작전 망하기 전에 네 삶이 어땠는지는 몰라도

translation.en: but all I've ever done is screw up.
My scholarship, my baseball career, the hockey league I started with dogs,
translation.ko: 장학금, 야구 선수 경력 개들로 시작한 하키 리그

translation.en: but then I whipped a grenade into that vent--
I told them I wanted vent covers. What was the point of all those meetings?
translation.ko: 환풍구 막자고 그렇게 말했건만 회의 많이 해봤자 다 허사야

translation.en: I finally got a win.
I mean, saving the planet is, like, the first thing I've ever done right.
translation.ko: 지구를 구하는 건 내가 처음으로 제대로 한 일이거든

translation.en: Why can't every day be like that?
Oh, so you want us to invade again?
No, but--
-Huh. -What?
What?
Everyone watch out! It escaped!
I did not escape! This man let me out--
translation.ko: 탈출한 거 아닙니다! 이 남자가 날 내보내서…

translation.en: -Ow, stop that! -[Matty grunts]
Oh come on!
-Get off my plane! -[Axatrax continues grunting]
Lucy, look! I'm saving you from the aliens again!
translation.ko: 루시, 봐요! 외계인으로부터 당신을 또 구하고 있어요!

translation.en: Come on, let's make out!
This is pathetic.
You let him out just to what, capture him again?
translation.ko: 외계인을 풀어줬는데, 왜요 고작 다시 잡으려고요?

translation.en: -[Axatrax] Anyone see where my arm went? -And for the record, you didn't "save me."
translation.ko: 내 팔 본 사람? 이것도 말해둘게요 당신은 나를 '구한' 적 없어요

translation.en: I was flying the hang glider.
Pageant prizes aren't always scholarships. Sometimes they're hang-gliding lessons.
translation.ko: 미인 대회 상에 장학금만 있는 게 아니라고요 가끔 행글라이딩 강습도 해줘요

translation.en: You were attached to me in the little BabyBjörn thing.
translation.ko: 당신이 아기 띠 같은 거로 나한테 매달렸잖아요

translation.en: I was not a baby. My feet could touch.
translation.ko: 나 아기 아니었어요 발이 땅에 닿았을 거라고요

translation.en: Green, about yea long.
You may be good at throwing grenades, Matthew Mulligan,
translation.ko: 매슈 멀리건 당신이 수류탄은 잘 던질지 몰라도

translation.en: but you are bad at president-ing, because you're selfish.
Oh yeah? Well, your dumb causes are dumb.
Old people smell weird,
fat kids are funny,
and animals are supposed to be food.
-We should be eating that thing. -[panda] Hmm?
Oh my God, you're the worst!
-Ugh! -No, wait, come back. I… I was just negging you,
translation.ko: 잠깐만요, 돌아와요 괜히 한번 쏘아 댄 거예요

translation.en: like in the book.
Lucy!
Oh, you love it.
She'll be here. Negging always works.
translation.ko: 올 거예요 쏘아 대는 건 늘 통해요

translation.en: Hey, no rush.
I'm just psyched to be doing priest stuff again.
translation.ko: 다시 사제 일을 하게 돼서 마냥 들뜬걸요

translation.en: Re-frocked, baby.
Uh, Mr. President, Lucy's not coming.
And if you ask me, this here's an opportunity.
Did you really wanna marry
some chatty Catherine with a bunch of big ideas?
But if she doesn't show up, it would be wicked embarrassing.
translation.ko: 하지만 루시가 안 나타나면 죽도록 민망할 텐데요

translation.en: Should I, like, pull a fire alarm or something?
Not hardly.
No, the people need their bread and circuses.
translation.ko: 아니, 먹을 것과 구경거리로 사람들을 달래야 해요

translation.en: Right, like a churro.
Oh, believe me, I've seen what happens when folks get disenchanted with a movement.
translation.ko: 내 말 믿어요, 난 사람들이 운동에 환멸을 느끼면 어찌 되는지 봤어요

translation.en: If we don't give 'em something they can believe in,
those hippies out there are gonna turn into Charlie Mansonses,
translation.ko: 저기 저 히피들이 찰리 맨슨 무리로 돌변할 거예요

translation.en: which is why I arranged for backup.
-Wait, a what? -Sandra was an NFL cheerleader.
You know they're not allowed to wear underwear?
translation.ko: 치어리더는 속옷 착용이 금지된 거 알죠?

translation.en: Wait, hold up. I feel like I should meet her first.
translation.ko: 잠깐만요 먼저 만나봐야 할 것 같은데요

translation.en: You and I, we're a team here, son.
I'm the brains and the fingers of America,
but you, you're its handsome face.
And for me to do my job,
all I need is for you to smile and give the people a little show.
translation.ko: 대통령님이 미소를 띠고 사람들에게 쇼를 보여줘야 해요

translation.en: Pretty as a painting, ain't she?
Now get it done!
So you have a ring, or do you need me to hook you up?
translation.ko: 반지가 있나요? 아니면 제가 하나 마련해 드려요?

translation.en: I guess we're missing the president's wedding.
Screw him.
He's got to be the, like, fourth-worst president ever.
translation.ko: 역대 네 번째 최악의 대통령이 될 거예요

translation.en: For reals! It's like the swamp is drained now.
translation.ko: 진짜로요! 이제 적폐 청산 된 거예요

translation.en: 'Cause the death rays boiled it.
Don't worry, we still got a couple of white guys in charge.
translation.ko: 걱정 마요 아직 백인 남자 둘이 남았잖아요

translation.en: Yeah! You know, before the aliens,
Senator LaMarr tried to make Black History Month
translation.ko: 라마 상원 의원은 흑인 역사의 달을

translation.en: a one-day holiday on February 31st.
The president told me his favorite book is the script for Boondock Saints.
translation.ko: 대통령은 제일 좋아하는 책이 '분닥 세인트' 대본집이래요

translation.en: Yeah. [inhales]
Okay, so we should quit.
For sure. I mean, why bother trying to preserve a world
translation.ko: 그래야죠, 내 말은 왜 굳이 세상을 구하려고 애써요?

translation.en: that no one ever appreciated to begin with?
Seriously. The only thing anyone but us would miss in the whole Smithsonian
is, like, Fonzie's jacket.
Oh no, we can't lose Fonzie's jacket.
translation.ko: 아이고, 폰지의 재킷을 잃을 순 없죠

translation.en: How will kids learn about Fonzies?
[TOD-209] TOD loot mimosas.
-[Dr. Braun] Whoo! -[Simon] Yeah!
Good luck without us, Mr. President.
Oh, this is full of broken glass.
[TOD-209] TOD such a Miranda.
I couldn't go through with it, man.
Is this gonna be a regular thing now, or--
LaMarr wanted me to marry this cheerleader,
but I didn't even know her.
I mean, I don't know Lucy that good,
but she's brave, and she cares about stuff,
and she's totally my type.
Yes, I remember your big speech.
And I am not on board with freckles, period.
translation.ko: 그리고 난 주근깨 난 여자는 못 받아들여요, 얘기 끝이에요

translation.en: I hooked up with this one chick whose face looked like--
translation.ko: 예전에 하룻밤 잔 어떤 여자는 생긴 게 꼭…

translation.en: LaMarr was pretty pissed.
He took a glove off a corpse and slapped me with it.
translation.ko: 시체에서 장갑을 벗기더니 그거로 날 후려치더라

translation.en: But I don't know. I mean, I just couldn't get Lucy out of my head.
translation.ko: 근데 모르겠어 루시 생각을 지울 수 없더라고

translation.en: She hang glidered onto a spaceship,
translation.ko: 루시는 행글라이더를 타고 우주선 위로 날아갔고

translation.en: and she said she believes in me.
No one's ever said that to me before.
I mean, my dad left his drywall business to my little sister.
translation.ko: 아빠는 건식 벽체 사업을 내 누이에게 물려줬단 말이야

translation.en: Ouch.
But I screwed it up with Lucy just like I screw up everything else.
translation.ko: 하지만 다른 일을 망친 것처럼 루시와도 내가 다 망쳤어

translation.en: -Honestly, Axie-- -Do not call me that.
translation.ko: - 솔직히 말해서, 액시… - 그렇게 부르지 마

translation.en: Part of me wishes you never even came to this planet.
translation.ko: 한편으로는 네가 이 행성에 아예 안 왔다면 좋겠다 싶어

translation.en: -Shazbot. -Why did you come here?
Earth is like a C-minus these days.
My planet is dying.
We used up all the natural resources on Cardi-B--
Your planet is named--
It's a coincidence!
After we poisoned our environment,
my armada was sent to clear Earth for resettlement.
translation.ko: 재정착을 위해 함대를 지구로 보낸 거야

translation.en: We were going to have a clean slate.
A chance to do it right this time.
Yes! That's it!
I'm a genius!
And I knew your arm would grow back!
translation.ko: 네 팔 다시 자라날 줄도 알았다!

translation.en: I don't believe you.
The measure passes. Gun ownership begins at conception.
-[Matty] LaMarr! -Oh!
-Executive order! -[heroic music plays]
[TOD-209] Gang has several hours until curfew.
Checking movie listings.
The following movies are now playing:
No movies.
-Ugh, no kidding. -[woman] Hey.
You guys gotta get to the National Mall. Executive order.
[Lucy] Yoo-hoo!
Don't be scared, little animals. Oink, oink.
Roar!
Giraffe noise?
-Ah, Lucy. -Goshdamn it, Matty.
How'd you even find me here?
Two words. Helicopter.
Hi, Lucy. I helicoptered!
Hi, General Scarpaccio.
What do you want, Matty?
Come on, I gotta show you something.
Please?
Ugh, fine.
Giraffe noise?
Wait, you did this?
[Matty] Yep. I executive ordered everyone
to pour all the skunked beer on the museum fire.
translation.ko: 맛이 간 맥주를 박물관 화재에 몽땅 들이부으라고 했어요

translation.en: You know, to save all the crap.
-Huh. -I don't always just think of myself.
[Simon panting] Mr. President, this is amazing!
Uh, ya think?
You see, I realized this whole mess could actually be a good thing.
translation.ko: 이 난장판이 좋은 일이 될 수도 있겠다는 걸 깨달았어요

translation.en: It's a clean slate. It's America 2: The Sequel!
Well, you're describing more of a reboot than a sequel, but… but sure.
We rocked ass before.
Remember that fried chicken sandwich where the bread was fried chicken?
translation.ko: 빵 대신 치킨을 쓴 치킨버거 기억나요?

translation.en: But, okay, I'm gonna say it, America wasn't perfect.
translation.ko: 하지만 이 말은 할게요 미국은 완벽하진 않았어요

translation.en: -What? Not America! -It isn't? Why wasn't I told?
translation.ko: - 네? 미국이 그럴 리가! - 그래요? 왜 전 처음 듣죠?

translation.en: 'Cause some people couldn't get a fair shake,
translation.ko: 공정한 기회를 못 받는 사람도 있었으니까요

translation.en: no matter how many times he applied to The Bachelor. [sighs]
translation.ko: '배첼러'에 몇 번이나 지원해도 안 됐던 거예요

translation.en: So let's make a new world.
One where a guy like me can win one for once.
translation.ko: 나 같은 놈이 한 번은 이길 수 있는 세상요

translation.en: Wow. Okay, maybe.
Also, maybe we could fulfill the promise of the Declaration of Independence.
translation.ko: 또 어쩌면 독립 선언서의 약속을 지킬 수 있을지도 몰라요

translation.en: And we can finally have equal pay and universal childcare.
translation.ko: 마침내 동등한 임금과 보편 보육을 이룰 수도 있어요

translation.en: [TOD-209] Ha. Ha. Good one, Farrah.
Goddamn it.
So yeah, let's save some stuff.
But only the good stuff.
I know how much you care about history.
It's Fonzie's jacket.
Yes, history. Thank you, Mr. President.
What do you say? Can we start over?
Well, everyone deserves a second chance,
translation.ko: 누구나 두 번째 기회를 얻을 자격이 있으니까요

translation.en: even the whole world.
So, like, you and me have a real first date?
translation.ko: 그럼 우리 둘이서 진짜 첫 데이트를 할까요?

translation.en: I don't know if any Olive Gardens survived,
translation.ko: 올리브 가든 체인점 중에 남은 곳이 있을지 모르지만

translation.en: but no Olive Garden, okay?
Let's all start over. Tabula rasa!
And let's get it right this time.
[TOD-209] Yes, it is a new--
[TOD-209 in distorted voice] Error. Replace brain tank fluid. Error.
translation.ko: 오류 발생, 뇌 탱크액 교체 요망

translation.en: -This guy. -TOD.
-Classic TOD. -Yeah, you said it.
Oh God, where are my kids?
That boy might could be a problem.
translation.ko: 저 녀석이 문제가 될 수도 있겠는기라

translation.en: [Matty] Guys, I found a trumpet!
